blogPost.excerpt: Hacker Memo is a simple memo app that pursues "coolness". The design is based on the image of science fiction and spy movies such as "The Matrix" and "007".
blogPost.body: Hacker Memo is a simple memo app that pursues "coolness". The design is based on the image of science fiction and spy movies such as "The Matrix" and "007".
blogPost.title: HackerMemo -  The coolest memo app for sci-fi lovers
blogPost.author: YuKiO | 個人開発&Flutter

localize.description: 黑客备忘录是一款追求 "酷 "的简单备忘录应用。设计以《黑客帝国》、《007》等科幻、谍战电影的形象为基础。
localize.tagline: 最酷的备忘录应用，适合科幻爱好者使用。

localize.description: 黑客備忘錄是一款追求 "酷 "的簡單備忘錄應用。設計以《黑客帝國》、《007》等科幻、諜戰電影的形象爲基礎。
localize.tagline: 最酷的備忘錄應用，適合科幻愛好者使用。

previous.excerpt: eProduct is and evidence-based product management software to hep you build customer driven products based on market evidence, reach market fit quicker and drive revenue. single platform to UNDERSTAND, MANAGE & LAUNCH products users need.
previous.title: eProduct.io - Evidence-based Product Management Software

localize.description: eProduct是一款基于证据的产品管理软件，它能帮助您根据市场证据建立客户驱动的产品，更快地达到市场契合度并提高收入。
localize.tagline: 基于证据的产品管理软件

localize.description: eProduct是一款基於證據的產品管理軟件，它能幫助您根據市場證據建立客戶驅動的產品，更快地達到市場契合度並提高收入。
localize.tagline: 基於證據的產品管理軟件

next.excerpt: FundedList is the best way to connect with hundreds of recently funded startup founders every week. The weekly reports contains verified emails, LinkedIn profiles, startup information, and funding data so you can send personalized outreach in seconds.
next.title: FundedList - Weekly report of newly funded founders with verified emails

localize.description: FundedList是每周与数百名最近获得资金的创业者建立联系的最佳方式。周报中包含经过验证的电子邮件、LinkedIn简介、创业者信息和资金数据，因此你可以在几秒钟内发送个性化的宣传。
localize.tagline: 新资助的创始人的每周报告，并有核实的电子邮件。

localize.description: FundedList是每週與數百名最近獲得資金的創業者建立聯繫的最佳方式。週報中包含經過驗證的電子郵件、LinkedIn簡介、創業者信息和資金數據，因此你可以在幾秒鐘內發送個性化的宣傳。
localize.tagline: 新資助的創始人的每週報告，並有覈實的電子郵件。
